thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text:
The only thing I would say is pay attention to the dimensions of the clothing, as in the actual measurements of the garment. I purchased a Medium-sized shirt, as I normally do, and found it to be a bit smaller than most Medium-sized items. This, of course, does not reflect on SSENSE, but on Vetements, as each brand's classification for sizing can vary.
What some webisites do is provide a brief description of the fit of the shirt, and some will even provide suggestions such as "buy one size up from your normal size". I think this would be a valuable addition to SSENSE and would enhance what is an already successful platform for shopping.
